name: Indie Game Battle
description: Indie Game Battle is a multiplayer fighting game for up to 8 players inspired by the Super Smash Bros series. However, IGB features indie characters instead!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 5 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
